name: Radishes
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - vegetables category
benefits: Radishes are exceptionally water-rich vegetables with approximately 95% water content, making them one of the lowest calorie-density foods available. As a cruciferous vegetable, radishes provide beneficial plant compounds including glucosinolates. Their crisp texture provides orosensory stimulation that may slow eating rate and enhance satiety.
amount: 3 radishes as part of chopped salad bowl

quotes: In a large bowl, combine all the salad ingredients, except the sunflower seeds.
